doc.field: Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera

Includes material for artists, including, among others, John Walker, S.B. Walker, Kay WalkingStick, Andy Warhol, Darren Waterston, William Wegman, James Welling, Rebecca Welz, Richard Wentworth, Stephen Westfall, Clarence White, Robert Whitman, Richard Wilcox, Philomenia Williamson, Christopher Wilmarth, Fred Wilson, and Jane Wilson. Also includes a 2002 Smithsonian Hirshhorn Museum and Sculpture Garden brochure on its H.C. Westermann exhibition with a short biography of the artist. Includes a 2018 exhibition brochure on the David Hammons curated exhibition, "Charles White/ Leonardo Da Vinci" with a short biography of Charles White. Includes a 2014 MOMA Program brochure on the exhibition, "Christopher Williams: The Production Line of Happiness". Includes a 2009 Kentler International Drawing Space brochure on its exhibition, "Hugh Williams: Alabama Wire Drawings" with a short biography of the artist. Includes a 2018 Michael Rosenfeld Gallery booklet that features selections from William T. Williams' 111 1/2 Series. Includes a Van Cleef & Arpels booklet on its installation, "Noah's Ark inspires Van Cleef & Arpels: Concept & Design Robert Wilson" with a short biography on Robert Wilson. Includes a 2018 Drawing Center brochure on its exhibition, "Terry Winters: Facts and Fictions" with a short biography of the artist.
Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series I. Single Artist Exhibitions >> W (Set 2) (2 folders)
